trans-unit.source: For 32bit architectures and freebsd platform support use ver. 0.1.10.
trans-unit.target: 32bit アーキテクチャと freebsd プラットフォームをサポートするためには ver.0.1.10.

trans-unit.source: Getting grammatical information and lemmas.
trans-unit.target: 文法情報やレマを取得する。

trans-unit.source: If you are interested in further developments or becoming a maintainter of this project please drop us an email: your help is greatly appreciated.
trans-unit.target: さらなる開発に興味がある方、このプロジェクトのメンテナーになりたい方は、メールでご連絡ください。

trans-unit.source: Lemmatization
trans-unit.target: レムマチ化

trans-unit.source: Please report any bugs or requests that you have using the GitHub issue tracker (https://github.com/nlpub/pymystem3/issues)! We have only very limited amount of resources to maintain this project: please propose a pull request directly if you see an obvious way of fixing the issue. We are very open to accepting bug fixes and your help is greatly appreciated.
trans-unit.target: Please report any bugs or requests that you have using the GitHub issue tracker (https://github.com/nlpub/pymystem3/issues)! We have only very limited amount of resources to maintain this project: please propose a pull request directly if you see an obvious way of fixing the issue. We are very open to accepting bug fixes and your help is greatly appreciated.

trans-unit.source: Python is the language of choice for many computational linguists, including those working with Russian language. The main motivation for this development was absence of any Python wrapper for the Mystem, a one of the most popular morphological analyzers for Russian language along with the PyMorphy2, the TreeTagger and AOT.
trans-unit.target: Python is the language of choice for many computational linguists, including those working with Russian language. The main motivation for this development was absence of any Python wrapper for the Mystem, a one of the most popular morphological analyzers for Russian language along with the PyMorphy2, the TreeTagger and AOT.

trans-unit.source: Python wrapper for the Yandex MyStem 3.1 morpholocial analyzer of the Russian language.
trans-unit.target: ロシア語のYandex MyStem 3.1 形態素解析器の Python ラッパー。

trans-unit.source: Stable version: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pymystem3. You can install it using pip:
trans-unit.target: Stable version: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pymystem3. You can install it using pip:

trans-unit.source: System Requrements
trans-unit.target: システム要件

trans-unit.source: The full list of contributors is listed by Github. You can also contact the original contributors of the project via email:
trans-unit.target: 貢献者の完全なリストはGithubに掲載されています。また、このプロジェクトのオリジナルの貢献者にメールで連絡を取ることもできます。

trans-unit.source: The third version of Mystem introduces several importaint improvements, most importaintly part-of-speech disambiguation. Our wrapper runs the Mystem in the mode which performs POS disambiguation.
trans-unit.target: Mystemの第3バージョンでは、いくつかの重要な改良が加えられていますが、最も重要なのは品詞の曖昧性の解消です。私たちのラッパーは、品詞判別を行うモードでMystemを実行します。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper was tested on Ubuntu Linux 12.04+, Mac OSX 10.9+ and Windows 7+.
trans-unit.target: このラッパーは Ubuntu Linux 12.04+,Mac OSX 10.9+,Windows 7+で動作確認済みです。

trans-unit.source: The wrapper works with CPython 2.6+/3.3+ and PyPy 1.9+.
trans-unit.target: このラッパーはCPython 2.6+/3.3+とPyPy 1.9+で動作します。

trans-unit.source: This module contains a wrapper for an excellent morphological analyzer for Russian language Yandex Mystem 3.1 released in June 2014. A morphological analyzer can perform lemmatization of text and derive a set of morphological attributes for each token. For more details about the algorithm see I. Segalovich «A fast morphological algorithm with unknown word guessing induced by a dictionary for a web search engine», MLMTA-2003, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.
trans-unit.target: This module contains a wrapper for an excellent morphological analyzer for Russian language Yandex Mystem 3.1 released in June 2014. A morphological analyzer can perform lemmatization of text and derive a set of morphological attributes for each token. For more details about the algorithm see I. Segalovich «A fast morphological algorithm with unknown word guessing induced by a dictionary for a web search engine», MLMTA-2003, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

trans-unit.source: This wrapper is open sources under MIT license. However, please consider that the Yandex Mystem is not open source and licensed under conditions of the Yandex License.
trans-unit.target: This wrapper is open sources under MIT license. However, please consider that the Yandex Mystem is not open source and licensed under conditions of the Yandex License.
